## Forms

`r form_start()`

- True or False? You can permute values in a vector using `sample()`. `r torf(TRUE, "t1")`
- Type a vowel: `r fitb(c("A", "E", "I", "O" , "U"), ignore_case = TRUE, name = "vowel")`
- True  `r torf(TRUE)`
- False `r torf(FALSE)`

`r total_correct()`

`r form_end()`
